title: Performative and Practical Assessment Design for Strengthening Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Information Retrieval Skills and Understanding of Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Project-Based Assessment Process for In-Service Secondary Science Teachers in Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environments

learning_goals: Systematically evaluate credible information sources required for designing actual science instruction
Apply critical analysis skills to resolve information-related problems occurring in science education settings
Continuously improve information literacy performance processes through peer feedback and self-assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
